description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，湘军的创立者和统帅，洋务运动的代表人物之一。
description.en: A key minister in the late Qing Dynasty, founder and commander of the Xiang Army, and one of the representatives of the Self-Strengthening Movement.

description.zh-cn: 晚清重臣，曾国藩的门生，洋务运动的主要领导人之一。
description.en: A key minister in the late Qing Dynasty, a student of Zeng Guofan, and a main leader of the Self-Strengthening Movement.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩之父。
description.en: Father of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩四弟，湘军重要将领，官至两江总督。
description.en: Fourth younger brother of Zeng Guofan, an important general of the Xiang Army, who served as the Viceroy of Liangjiang.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩幼弟。
description.en: Youngest brother of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩次子，清朝著名外交家。
description.en: Second son of Zeng Guofan, a famous diplomat of the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩三子，数学家。
description.en: Third son of Zeng Guofan, a mathematician.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩六女。
description.en: Sixth daughter of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩之妻。
description.en: Wife of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩在湖南组建的地方团练武装，是镇压太平天国的主要军事力量。
description.en: A local militia organized by Zeng Guofan in Hunan, which was the main military force in suppressing the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由洪秀全领导的大规模反清运动。
description.en: A large-scale anti-Qing movement led by Hong Xiuquan during the late Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 晚清时期由清朝政府部分官员推动的引进西方军事装备、机器生产和科学技术的自强运动。
description.en: A self-strengthening movement during the late Qing Dynasty promoted by some government officials to introduce Western military equipment, machine production, and scientific technology.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，高度评价曾国藩。
description.en: A politician and military leader of the Republic of China who highly praised Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国的缔造者，曾高度评价曾国藩。
description.en: Founder of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who once highly praised Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 太平天国运动的领袖。
description.en: Leader of the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 洪秀全领导的武装起义，标志着太平天国运动的开始。
description.en: An armed uprising led by Hong Xiuquan, marking the beginning of the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 天津民众与法国天主教会之间的暴力冲突事件。
description.en: A violent conflict between Tianjin residents and the French Catholic Church.

description.zh-cn: 满人军机大臣，曾国藩的门师。
description.en: A Manchu Grand Councilor who was Zeng Guofan's mentor.

description.zh-cn: 清朝第九位皇帝，在位期间太平天国运动爆发。
description.en: The ninth emperor of the Qing Dynasty, during whose reign the Taiping Rebellion broke out.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩创办的中国第一个自主制造现代武器的兵工厂。
description.en: The first modern arsenal in China founded by Zeng Guofan to manufacture its own weapons.

description.zh-cn: 由曾国藩和李鸿章创办的晚清最重要的军工企业。
description.en: The most important military-industrial enterprise of the late Qing Dynasty, founded by Zeng Guofan and Li Hongzhang.

description.zh-cn: 清朝地方最高级官吏之一，管辖江苏、安徽、江西三省。
description.en: One of the highest-ranking local officials in the Qing Dynasty, governing Jiangsu, Anhui, and Jiangxi provinces.

description.zh-cn: 清朝地方最高级官吏之一，管辖今天的河北、北京、天津等地。
description.en: One of the highest-ranking local officials in the Qing Dynasty, governing modern-day Hebei, Beijing, and Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 湘军攻破天京后对城内平民的大规模屠杀、抢掠和焚烧。
description.en: Large-scale massacre, looting, and arson against civilians in the city after the Xiang Army captured Tianjing.

description.zh-cn: 位于长沙的著名古代书院，曾国藩曾在此学习。
description.en: A famous ancient academy in Changsha where Zeng Guofan studied.

description.zh-cn: 中国马克思主义史学家，对曾国藩持负面评价。
description.en: Chinese Marxist historian who held a negative view of Zeng Guofan.

description.zh-cn: 由洪秀全建立的与清朝对立的政权。
description.en: A rebel state established by Hong Xiuquan in opposition to the Qing Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曾国荃为曾国藩四弟。
description.en: Zeng Guoquan was Zeng Guofan's fourth younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 曾国葆为曾国藩幼弟。
description.en: Zeng Guobao was Zeng Guofan's youngest brother.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪泽为曾国藩次子。
description.en: Zeng Jize was Zeng Guofan's second son.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪鸿为曾国藩三子。
description.en: Zeng Jihong was Zeng Guofan's third son.

description.zh-cn: 曾纪芬为曾国藩六女。
description.en: Zeng Jifen was Zeng Guofan's sixth daughter.

description.zh-cn: 李鸿章投于曾国藩门下受业，有师徒关系。
description.en: Li Hongzhang became a student of Zeng Guofan, establishing a teacher-student relationship.

description.zh-cn: 曾国藩为穆彰阿的得意门生。
description.en: Zeng Guofan was a protégé of Muzhanga.

description.zh-cn: 金田起义标志着太平天国运动的正式爆发。
description.en: The Jintian Uprising marked the official beginning of the Taiping Rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 奉命帮办湖南团练，后扩编为湘军。
description.en: Ordered to help organize Hunan's local militias, which were later expanded into the Xiang Army.

description.zh-cn: 湘军是镇压太平天国的主要军事力量。
description.en: The Xiang Army was the main military force that suppressed the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 支持恭亲王奕䜣主持的洋务运动，大力支持地方兴办实业。
description.en: Supported the Self-Strengthening Movement led by Prince Gong and strongly supported the establishment of local industries.

description.zh-cn: 与李鸿章依靠外国人在上海创办。
description.en: Founded in Shanghai with Li Hongzhang, relying on foreigners.

description.zh-cn: 与曾国藩依靠外国人在上海创办。
description.en: Founded in Shanghai with Zeng Guofan, relying on foreigners.

description.zh-cn: 因处理天津教案屈从洋人而遭到舆论谴责，声誉大受影响，甚至被称为“曾国贼”。
description.en: His handling of the Tianjin Massacre by yielding to foreigners led to public condemnation, severely damaging his reputation, and he was even called 'Zeng the traitor'.

description.zh-cn: 蒋中正对曾国藩顶礼膜拜，认为其为人之道足为师资，并将其著作作为教科书。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek deeply admired Zeng Guofan, considering his principles a model to learn from, and used his writings as textbooks.

description.zh-cn: 青年时代的毛泽东表示独服曾国藩，晚年也称其为地主阶级最厉害的人物。
description.en: In his youth, Mao Zedong expressed his admiration solely for Zeng Guofan, and in his later years, he called him the most formidable figure of the landlord class.

description.zh-cn: 作为攻破天京的湘军指挥官，对屠城负有直接责任。
description.en: As the commander of the Xiang Army that captured Tianjing, he was directly responsible for the massacre.

description.zh-cn: 作为湘军的最高统帅，对屠城负有责任。
description.en: As the supreme commander of the Xiang Army, he was responsible for the massacre.

description.zh-cn: 称其为屠杀同胞，媚满媚外的“汉奸刽子手”。
description.en: Called him a 'traitor and executioner' for massacring compatriots and fawning over Manchus and foreigners.
